ARABIC: قَالُوا۟ نَعْبُدُ أَصْنَامًا فَنَظَلُّ لَهَا عَٰكِفِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They said, 'We worship idols and will continue to cling to them.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They replied: "We worship idols and are devoted to them."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They answered: "There are some idols that we worship and are devoted to them with constancy."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: when he asked his father and others, "What do you worship?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They said, “We worship idols, and we keep squatting in seclusion before them.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They said: "We worship idols, and to them we are ever devoted."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They said: We worship idols, so we shall be their votaries.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They said, 'We serve idols, and continue cleaving to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They said: We worship idols, and are ever devoted unto them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They said, "We worship idols and will continue to cling to them."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They said: we worship idols, and we are unto them ever devoted
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They said, ‘We worship idols, and are constant in our devotion to them.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They said: "We worship idols, and we remain constantly in attendance on them."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They said: "We worship idols, and to them we are ever devoted."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They replied: 'We worship idols and continue cleaving to them'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They said, “We worship idols, and we remain devoted to them.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They said, "We worship idols and remain to them devoted."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:71]   They said, ‘We worship idols — they reiterate the verb [in the response] in order to supplement it with [the following remark] — and remain cleaving to them’, we remain worshipping them all day; they give a longer response to indicate their [misplaced] pride in such [an act].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They said: We worship idols) deities, (and are ever devoted unto them) we worship them and remain devoted to their worship.
